name: B_T_B DEMO
description:
Welcome to the Demo of Project B_T_B.

In the course of your session, you will playtest our game, meeting our cast of characters, trekking through interesting areas,  and helping us complete our project.

During your adventure, you can duel monsters, hear interesting storylines, and you can ask The Developer about anything you may want to know!

Please, if you encounter any issues, send put them in our comments below, and we'll make sure to fix them when we get our game released!

^WHAT WE HAVE^

1. The first area you explore in the game.

2. The beginnings of a wild, and thought provoking adventure!

3. A vast mystery to explore.... mostly because someone's hacking into our game, and changing important parts of it.

4. Did we mention that someone's changing our game?  We really need help with that.

5. A soundtrack made by the creative minds of DJChummy, and Rystar!

6. Art created by *Hado Hasegawa.

7.Code made in the Godot Engine by *Hado Hasegawa.

* Our Artist-Coder Friend?

https://fancy-fairy-co.itch.io
